title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

moduleName.title: The moduleName schema
moduleName.description: moduleName must be unique across the whole mono repo

teamNamespace.title: The teamNamespace schema
teamNamespace.description: teamNamespace must be unique across the whole mono repo

sharedParams.title: The sharedParams schema
sharedParams.description: Params shared across all the projects with in the namespace

defaultFileChangeTrigger.title: The defaultFileChangeTrigger schema
defaultFileChangeTrigger.description: List of files that are tracked under defaultFileChangeTrigger variable to trigger pipeline based on the event.

name.description: helm name for pipeline for executing gradle task

anyOf.title: The first anyOf schema
anyOf.description: Runs jacocoTestReport task and sonarqube task for the project “examples:example-a“ via  pipeline-gradle-task pipeline developed for executing a generic gradle task when ever there is a change in the files that are tracked under defaultFileChangeTrigger variable..
